bibl.title: A Greek Christian Inscription from el-Chandaq, Nubia.
bibl.note: Funerary inscription [ed.: Ugo Monneret de Villard, La Nubia medioevale. I (Le Caire, 1935) p. 238]. Copied in el-Chandaq, 9th/10th century. The text finds very close analogy in the funerary inscription of Pitronia from Esna [I. Lefebvre 541].
bibl.seg: LAJTAR Adam, A Greek Christian Inscription from el-Chandaq, Nubia.
